bibl.title: Final Notes on Menander's Sikyonioi (vv. 343-423 with frs. 1, 2 and 7).
bibl.note: By-products of work devoted to Menander's Sikyonioi during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - Vv. 343, 346, 357-358, 362, 382-386, 385-396, 390,397-402, 410-411, 411-423; frr. 1, 2, 7 Kassel.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Final Notes on Menander's Sikyonioi (vv. 343-423 with frs. 1, 2 and 7).

By-products of work devoted to Menander's Sikyonioi during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - Vv. 343, 346, 357-358, 362, 382-386, 385-396, 390,397-402, 410-411, 411-423; frr. 1, 2, 7 Kassel.
